original_title: Nazareth Live From Camden Palace, London
overview: Recorded and filmed live at the Camden Palace, London in 1985, this is the classic Nazareth line-up performing some of their greatest worldwide hits including Love Hurts, perhaps their best-known hit single and a heartbreaking ballad that became a worldwide hit in 1975. Bonus features include a never seen before photo gallery of the band's performance.
title: Nazareth Live From Camden Palace, London
